title: Wuthering Heights
creator_credit: Samuel Z Arkoff and Robert Fuest
brief_description: Based on Emily Bronte’s novel of defiant young lovers and set in the 18th Century amidst the harsh realities of the Yorkshire moors. This version is considered a good and realistic treatment of Bronte’s novel with authentic locations. Starring Timothy Dalton as Heathcliff and Anne Calder-Marshall as Cathy.
